artist: Engraver: Anthony de Marcenay de Ghuy; Painter: After Laurent Pécheux
description: Regulus returning to Carthage with Regulus at center walking right and women and children trying to hold him back
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate lower left corner: A. demarcenay/ 1772 | below image in black: REGULUS / dedication and four lines in French/ publication location in Paris and signature | on sheet in pencil: 2-17
title: Regulus
